comment: In an algebraic closure system, if two independent sets have equal closure and one is infinite, then they are equinumerous. This is proven by using ~ acsdomd twice with ~ acsinfd . See Section II.5 in [Cohn] p. 81 to 82. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
